description:
Jade Marxxx arrives on set and announces that she doesn't want cyd to touch her feet during the shoot. Annoyed by this limitation, cyd decides to make her suffer for it by putting her through the most intense foot torture she has ever experienced - all without ever touching her feet.
Samantha Sin is also featured in the update, first bound on a box with an electrified dildo in her cunt, next spread wide open and bound face down onto a cage while Matt drags some random model in from the set next door, pushes her to her knees and buries her face in Samantha's ass, making the girl eat out her cunt and asshole. Samantha responds with a soundtrack of squeals, squeaks and moans.
title: Pretty Girls
